# Dam characteristics and recreation

Relevant characteristics:

* Dam height
* % width with continuous flow 
* Number of recreational users

## Data requirements/sources
Databases like the [National Inventory of Dams](https://nid.usace.army.mil/#/); recreational survey data, if available
